mapper.insert: INSERT INTO schedule (user_id, title, description, type, start_datetime, end_datetime, location, status, is_urgent, is_active) VALUES (#{userId}, #{title}, #{description}, #{type}, #{startDateTime}, #{endDateTime}, #{location}, #{status}, #{isUrgent}, #{isActive})
mapper.select:
SELECT s.* FROM schedule s WHERE s.user_id = #{userId} AND s.is_active = TRUE
AND DATE(s.start_datetime) >= DATE(#{startDate})
AND DATE(s.start_datetime) <= DATE(#{endDate})
ORDER BY s.start_datetime ASC
SELECT s.* FROM schedule s WHERE s.schedule_id = #{scheduleId} AND s.is_active = TRUE

SELECT s.* FROM schedule s WHERE s.user_id = #{userId} AND s.is_active = TRUE
AND s.type = #{type}
AND DATE(s.start_datetime) >= DATE(#{startDate})
AND DATE(s.start_datetime) <= DATE(#{endDate})
ORDER BY s.start_datetime ASC
SELECT s.* FROM schedule s WHERE s.user_id = #{userId} AND s.is_active = TRUE AND DATE(s.start_datetime) = CURDATE() ORDER BY s.start_datetime ASC

SELECT s.* FROM schedule s WHERE s.user_id = #{userId} AND s.is_active = TRUE AND DATE(s.start_datetime) > CURDATE() AND DATE(s.start_datetime) <= DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL #{days} DAY) ORDER BY s.start_datetime ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE schedule SET title = #{title}, description = #{description}, type = #{type}, start_datetime = #{startDateTime}, end_datetime = #{endDateTime}, location = #{location}, status = #{status}, is_urgent = #{isUrgent}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE schedule_id = #{scheduleId}
UPDATE schedule SET status = #{status}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE schedule_id = #{scheduleId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO task (user_id, title, description, priority, status, due_date, is_active) VALUES (#{userId}, #{title}, #{description}, #{priority}, #{status}, #{dueDate}, #{isActive})
mapper.select: SELECT t.* FROM task t WHERE t.user_id = #{userId} AND t.is_active = TRUE ORDER BY t.created_at DESC
SELECT t.* FROM task t WHERE t.task_id = #{taskId} AND t.is_active = TRUE
mapper.update: UPDATE task SET title = #{title}, description = #{description}, priority = #{priority}, status = #{status}, due_date = #{dueDate}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE task_id = #{taskId}
UPDATE task SET status = #{status}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE task_id = #{taskId}
mapper.select: SELECT t.* FROM task t WHERE t.user_id = #{userId} AND t.is_active = TRUE AND (DATE(t.due_date) = CURDATE() OR t.due_date IS NULL OR DATE(t.created_at) = CURDATE()) ORDER BY CASE t.status WHEN 'completed' THEN 1 WHEN 'in_progress' THEN 2 WHEN 'pending' THEN 3 ELSE 4 END, t.priority DESC, t.created_at ASC
SELECT t.* FROM task t WHERE t.user_id = #{userId} AND t.is_active = TRUE AND t.status IN ('pending', 'in_progress') ORDER BY t.due_date ASC, t.priority DESC
